page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: Witheridge is fortunate in having three recreation areas.One of them is a childrens playing field with climbing apparatus and a football pitch.Another is part of the school playing fields and is jointly owned by the Parish Council.It provides for football , cricket and organised games.The third area belongs to the Parish Hall and has a hard tennis court.There is a badminton club and indoor bowls which also meet in the Parish Hall.There is a gardening club which organises an annual flower show.The school swimming pool is used by other organisations such as the cubs and brownies and it also provides for a toddlers swimming group on Saturdays.The ladies of the village have formed their own skittles team and play in a league.There is also a darts team based on the local hotel.
